Melly Goeslaw Lebih Suka Pakai Sneakers Dekil, Alasannya...
06 Nov 2019, 08:05 by Cantika.com, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Melly Goeslaw terkenal dengan gayanya yang unik. Salah satu keunikannya adalah hobinya memakai sneakers, tapi bukan yang kinclong. Padahal, sepatunya harganya bisa sampai ratusan juta rupiah.
Kebiasaan penyanyi dan pencipta lagu itu terungkap di saluran YouTube Helaw TV. saluran itu Melly selalu berkolaborasi dengan penyanyi Hedi Yunus membahas berbagai topik dalam bahasa campuran, yaitu Sunda dan Indonesia. Kedua penyanyi asal Bandung ini juga sering menyelipkan candaan di tengah-tengah obrolan santai.
Di episode keenam berjudul Koleksi Kumaha Aing! yang tayang pada 21 Oktober 2019, keduanya membahas kesamaan suka berburu sneakers. Dalam video berdurasi 13.44 itu terlihat keduanya duduk di lantai dengan barisan sneakers bermerek dan edisi terbatas di depannya. Antara lain nampak sneakers keluaran Balenciaga, Off White hingga Nike. Terhitung ada 10 sneakers yang merupakan gabungan sneakers Hedi dan Melly.
Di antara sneakers itu terdapat sneakers bertema monokrom, hitam dan putih, yang sama-sama dimiliki keduanya. Diungkapkan oleh Hedi Yunus, mereka pernah memakainya bersamaan saat promo lagu religi.
Menariknya, harga sepatu ini berbeda hingga ratusan juta. Bila Melly Goeslaw membeli di toko saat mengunjungi Jepang senilai Rp 800 juta. Hedi Yunus membeli dengan cara menitip temannya yang pergi ke Australia. Ia membayar sebanyak Rp 913 juta.
“Saking pengennya beli sepatu ini (sneakers yang kembaran dengan Hedi Yunus). Karena ini salah satu hobi saya. Kejar setoran. Karena salah satunya untuk mencapai beli ini,” ucap Melly Goeslaw.
Keduanya sempat mendiskusikan perbedaan harga tersebut karena membeli dari dua sumber berbeda, yakni retailer dan reseller. Melly pun mengimbau untuk tidak membeli dari reseller karena harganya sudah dinaikkan terlebih dahulu. Lebih baik menyumbangkan kelebihan uang itu kepada yang membutuhkan.
Menariknya, meski harga sneakers Melly di kisaran puluhan dan ratusan juta, ia lebih suka memakai sepatu sneakers dalam kondisi tidak bersih.
Saat bercakap-cakap tentang kebersihan sepatu, Hedi bertanya dalam bahasa Sunda dengan terjemahan, “Kamu tuh, ini sepatu tidak dibersihkan?”
Istri musisi Anto Hoed ini menjawab, “Nah ini bedanya saya dengan Anda. Kalau saya tuh suka sepatunya dekil. Jadi kalau ada yang baru tuh, sama saya suka diinjek-injek. Gitu. Sukanya yang dekil, gak suka yang bersih. Kurang gaya aja kata saya, sih."
Sembari bercanda ia menambahkan, “Setengah kamar saya isinya sepatu. Baju, setengah kamar lagi.”
Candaan pun berlanjut saat mereka membahas cara merawat sepatu. Hedi Yunus menjelaskan dengan cara disimpan di dalam lemari dengan suhu dan ventilasi tertentu. Melly menanggapi berbeda,“Ini kan mahal-mahal. Kalau aku pakai suhu tertentu. Royal family. Kalau yang up version ditabur formalin. Jadi lebih awet dan kuat.” Hedi Yunus pun menanggapi, “Mayat kali ah. Lo mah edan.”

SILVY RIANA PUTRI

Melly Goeslaw Prefers Wear Dekil Sneakers, The Reason ...
Nov 6 2019, 08:05 by Cantika.com, Mila Novita
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Melly Goeslaw is famous for her unique style. One of its uniqueness is its hobby of wearing sneakers, but not the sleek ones. In fact, the shoes can cost up to hundreds of millions of rupiah.
The habits of the singer and songwriter were revealed on Helaw TV's YouTube channel. The channel Melly always collaborates with singer Hedi Yunus to discuss various topics in mixed languages, namely Sundanese and Indonesian. The two singers from Bandung also often slipped jokes in the middle of casual chat.
In the sixth episode titled Kumaha Aing Collection! which aired on October 21, 2019, the two discussed similarities in hunting sneakers. In the 13.44 video it is seen that both of them are sitting on the floor with rows of branded sneakers and a limited edition in front of them. Among other things appeared sneakers from Balenciaga, Off White to Nike. There are 10 sneakers that are a combination of Hedi and Melly sneakers.
Among the sneakers are monochrome, black and white themed sneakers, both of which are owned by both. Hedi Yunus revealed, they had used it together at the time of religious song promos.
Interestingly, the price of these shoes is different to hundreds of millions. When Melly Goeslaw bought in a shop while visiting Japan for Rp. 800 million. Hedi Yunus bought by entrusting his friend who went to Australia. He paid as much as Rp. 913 million.
"I really want to buy these shoes (sneakers that are twin with Hedi Yunus). Because this is one of my hobbies. Chase deposit. Because one of them is to achieve this purchase, "said Melly Goeslaw.
Both of them discussed the price difference because they bought from two different sources, namely retailers and resellers. Melly also appealed not to buy from a reseller because the price had been raised first. It's better to donate the excess money to the needy.
Interestingly, although the price of Melly sneakers is in the range of tens and hundreds of millions, he prefers to wear sneakers in unclean conditions.
When talking about the cleanliness of shoes, Hedi asked in Sundanese with a translation, "You see, are these shoes not cleaned?"
The wife of musician Anto Hoed answered, "Well, this is the difference between me and you. I like dirty shoes. So if there is a new one, I like being trodden on. Gitu. His dirty little, do not like clean. Lack of style I just said, anyway. "
He jokingly added, "Half of my room is filled with shoes. Clothes, half the room again. "
The joke continued when they discussed how to care for shoes. Hedi Yunus explained by storing it in a cupboard with a certain temperature and ventilation. Melly responded differently, "This is expensive. If I use a certain temperature. Royal family. If the up version is formalin sown. So more durable and stronger. "Hedi Yunus also responded," Corpse times ah. Crazy mad. "

SILVY RIANA PRINCESS
